The topic of my text is about Iruma city, which is part of Saitama prefecture. This town is also my hometown. This report would introduce this city in terms of some views.
Section 1 title. The concept of Iruma city
Section 2 title The history of Iruma city
The oldest record of this city is the Nara era. This city was famous for earthen vessels and the skill of building the temple's roof. In 1956, some cities were merged and named ‘Musashi City’ which is now Iruma City. Ten years later, its name was changed to Iruma City. This name would come from the old law's order. In addition, this name was 3rd place at the vote which decided the city's name.
In Iruma City, there are two festivals mainly. The first one is held in April. Its name is Toulou Festival. Omikoshi, which is recorded as a cultural heritage, is carried from a local temple. This festival’s feature is that this one is done in a long street.
Second one is the Mantou Festival. This is held in October. Mantou is the object that was shown at the door and it means the wish for the health of everyone. This one is different from the area. Mantou Festival is done to surround the 4 streets. People would visit to spend the time longer than the Toulou Festival.
Section 4 title Tips of Iruma City
In Iruma City, there are some famous people, especially the writers of cartoons. 2 members would join weekly jump, which is popular magazines for boys and girls in Japan. They are Matsui Yusei,and Asou Shuichi.
In other cultures, for example, there are 3 J leaguers,​​3 announcers.
Also, there is an area that was dominated by America. Its town is called ‘Johnson Town’. Its atmosphere isn’t similar to Japan so there are strange bread stores or parks in this area.
